work_history.title: Asana
work_history.subtitle: Engineering Manager (2018-2020), Software Engineer (2020-Present)
description: As a manager, I supported the iOS and Android teams by coaching, mentoring, improving processes, and getting my hands dirty in code. In 2020, I decided I wasn’t ready to leave the technical side behind, so I switched to an IC role. Now I’m on the Mobile Foundations team and I’m responsible for iOS architecture across our whole app.

In addition to my work with the iOS and Android teams, I also help the engineering intern program run smoothly, edit most Asana Engineering blog posts and facilitate the release of open source software.

work_history.title: Hipmunk
work_history.subtitle: iOS Engineer → Mobile Team Lead → Engineering Manager
description: Worked on Hipmunk for iOS. Became mobile team lead in January 2016, engineering manager January 2017. Reworked a messy code base while shipping on time. Owned the entire mobile recruiting pipeline and hired 3 engineers. Acted as an ambassador of company culture by giving enthusiastic demos and writing blog posts.

work_history.title: Graffiti Labs
work_history.subtitle: Full Stack Engineer, Game Designer
description: As one of two engineers, helped design and build a realtime browser-based multiplayer sandbox building game played by thousands of people. Worked with performance-sensitive JavaScript, websockets, iOS (Swift and Obj-C), React.JS, and subtleties of Python.

work_history.title: Yelp
work_history.subtitle: Spam Warrior
description: Worked on systems that ensure yelp.com only shows authentic reviews, including algorithms and internal tools. Maintained mrjob, a framework with thousands of users that runs Python code on Hadoop.

work_history.title: Apple
work_history.subtitle: Intern on Obj-C Runtime Team
description: Implemented early prototype of the Xcode visual object graph debugging tool released in 2016.

work_history.title: MIM Software
work_history.subtitle: Intern
description: Built the first prototype of MIMcloud, a web site for HIPAA-compliant medical image sharing.

personal_projects.title: Browserboard
description: A multiuser whiteboard web app built with Django, Node.js, Vue, and good ol’ DOM.

personal_projects.title: Oscillator Drum Loops
description: An iPhone and iPad app companion to a drum instruction book. The app contains over 140 exercises with sheet music and music loops that can be played back at variable tempos with a metronome. The app is fully VoiceOver-accessible, and its layout works in portrait and landscape mode all the way from iPhone SE up to iPad Pro.

personal_projects.title: Literally Canvas
description: An extensible JavaScript library for embedding an MS Paint-like drawing widget in web pages. This project has been used in many surprising places over its long lifetime.

personal_projects.title: Hobbyist Game Development
description: 20+ small games in BASIC, Python, JavaScript, Godot, Nim, and Swift.
Art and music of uneven quality.

education.title: Case Western Reserve University
description: B.S. and M.S. in Computer Science. Organizer for CWRU Hacker Society, which is a series of tech talks and a touchpoint for the student community. Pianist for IMPROVment comedy troupe.
